statements: DELETE FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE IndividualName = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE IndividualName = 'John Doe' AND ScanDate < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM CriminalCases WHERE investigation_status = FALSE AND crime_type = 'Robbery';
DELETE FROM CriminalRecords WHERE criminal_id = 100 AND criminal_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM RetinaScanData WHERE scan_id = 500 AND eye_color = 'Brown';
DELETE FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 100 AND crime_details LIKE '%murder%';
